RemediationStrings.Title: Powershell not installed
RemediationStrings.Description: Powershell is required with Compliance Checks scripts. Install Powershell and Refresh settings.

RemediationStrings.Title: Powershell version is not up to date.
RemediationStrings.Description: Required Powershell version 7.3.3 provides tools used with Compliance Checks scripts. Update Powershell and Refresh settings.

RemediationStrings.Title: SecureBoot is not enabled.
RemediationStrings.Description: SecureBoot needs to enabled to get access to company resources. Enable SecureBoot and Refresh settings.

RemediationStrings.Title: Your Organization requires Microsoft Defender for Endpoint on Linux devices.
RemediationStrings.Description: Install Defender for Endpoint and try again.

RemediationStrings.Title: Your Organization requires Microsoft Defender for Endpoint on Linux devices is registered to your organization.
RemediationStrings.Description: Configure Defender for Endpoint and try again.

RemediationStrings.Title: Your Organization requires Microsoft Defender for Endpoint on Linux devices is in healthy state.
RemediationStrings.Description: Configure and/or update Defender for Endpoint and try again.

RemediationStrings.Title: Your Organization requires Microsoft Defender for Endpoint on Linux devices is updated.
RemediationStrings.Description: Update Defender for Endpoint Definitions and try again.

RemediationStrings.Title: Your Organization requires Microsoft Defender for Endpoint on Linux devices has Realtime scan enable.
RemediationStrings.Description: Configure Defender for Endpoint Realtime settings and try again.

RemediationStrings.Title: Microsoft Edge browser is not installed.
RemediationStrings.Description: Microsoft Edge browser is used for safe access to company resources. Install Microsoft Edge browser and Refresh settings.

RemediationStrings.Title: Microsoft Edge version is not up to date.
RemediationStrings.Description: Required Microsfot Edge version should be at least 111.0.1661.41. Update Microsoft Edge and Refresh settings.

RemediationStrings.Title: Linux kernel version is not up to date.
RemediationStrings.Description: Required kernel version should be at least 5.19.0. Update your device and Refresh settings.

RemediationStrings.Title: Linux kernel Patch version is not up to date.
RemediationStrings.Description: Required kernel Patch version should be at least 35. Update your device and Refresh settings.

RemediationStrings.Title: Linux kernel flavour is wrong.
RemediationStrings.Description: Kernel flavour should be generic. Change kernel to generic flavour and Refresh settings.

RemediationStrings.Title: Linux kernel is in tainted mode.
RemediationStrings.Description: Tainted kernel can cause a lot of problems. NVIDIA or AMD graphics drivers can cause kernel tainted mode. Contact your administrator if you think this is false positive error. Reboot computer and Refresh settings.

RemediationStrings.Title: Automatic screen lock is not enabled.
RemediationStrings.Description: Screen should lock automatically when screensaver is enabled. Change screen lock setting and Refresh settings.

RemediationStrings.Title: Automatic Screensaver idle activation not enabled.
RemediationStrings.Description: Enable idle activation lock with command: gsettings set org.gnome.desktop.screensaver idle-activation-enabled true and Refresh settings.

RemediationStrings.Title: Screen Blank timeout over 10 minutes.
RemediationStrings.Description: Screen Blank maximum timeout is 10 minutes. Change Screen Blank timeout setting and Refresh settings.
